website_summaries.verdict: This simplistic silicone brownie pan makes for the easiest, mess-free baking experience.
pros: FDA approved, professional grade silicone is safe to use in the oven
Brownies pop out with little effort, and the pan is easy to clean
Sturdy metal handles help the silicone hold its shape and makes lifting in and out of oven easy
cons: Silicone can be damaged with a knife
use a spatula or dull tool to cut your brownies

customer_reviews.title: Truely non stick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan over other silicone pans because of the metal handles, they make it sooo much easier to handle than other silicone pans. My 1st dish was a breakfast frittata, I didn't use any oil and the egg didn't stick at all. Love this pan.
customer_reviews.author: aeshamaynor

customer_reviews.title: Definitely non-stick
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this pan because it really is non-stick, even without spraying it. The metal sides are a nice touch but it still works best if you put it on a baking pan because it isn't actually sturdy. You also need to be careful not to use a sharp knife to cut your finished baked item if you leave it in the pan because it would probably cut through the silicone. I have used it twice now and had good results. I really wish they would include some sort of directions with it but there were none that I saw.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Nana

customer_reviews.title: Best silicone pan for 1 use, after that it just rips!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this pan - easy to clean, no need to grease it, easy to get brownies out of the pan. After 3-4 uses the red silicone just ripped :( not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: I used cooking spray and ended up with a perfect pan of brownies
customer_reviews.text: This was my first silicon baking pan. I was confused as to whether or not to use cooking spray as the product didn't come with instructions. I used cooking spray and ended up with a perfect pan of brownies. The manufacturer had contacted me regarding the purchase as well. They immediately responded to my request for instructions and were great to work with. I think Boxiki is a great company and am strongly considering other purchases from them.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I love silicone anything. I ordered this silicone brownie pan in hopes that it had some substance. The original silicone cake pans were flimsy. I was very happy to find sturdy handles & rim all around. The silicone cake pan part is thick enough to not have to fear collapsing & has a nice squiggle design on the bottom. I believe we will very happy together.
customer_reviews.author: robb quick

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous, not oven safe
customer_reviews.text: The first pan I received was bent. The replacement pan wasn't, so that was cool. Except that 4 minutes into baking at 400 degrees in convection oven the entire kitchen was filled with smoke and the smell of burning rubber. This is not real silicone. This isn't safe. This seller should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: I have never used silicone bakeware and I love to cook and bake
customer_reviews.text: I have never used silicone bakeware and I love to cook and bake.I made an amazing batch of brownies with ease. I really like the handles which make moving it in and out of the oven easy. I made an egg casserole and it came out perfectly cooked. Very happy with the way food comes out and also SOOOOO easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.text: Great pan so far. Used it to make lemon squares and was pleasantly surprised. Squares came out easy and pan was easy to clean. The metal handles really gave support to the otherwise flexible silicone. This is first time trying so didn't know what to expect. I'm very used to traditional pans and maybe that's why I didn't give it five stars. It is really nice and the cleanup was super easy. I will probably buy other similar ones in the future, especially as I get more comfortable with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan and the rim of metal around the top
customer_reviews.text: I debated between a couple pans when looking. I decided to spend a little more and get this pan. I'm so glad I did. The metal rim around the top help alot when putting the pan in the oven. Nothing sticks in it. It is great if your diet is oil free. No oil is need for your food to come out. I love mine. Will be buying another one in different size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eggs won't stick.
customer_reviews.text: I meal prep for the week. I make egg muffins for a breakfast sandwiches and previously the 8 x 8 glass pan I bake the eggs in would need to be soaked overnight to remove all the egg residue. I even sprayed and lined the dish with parchment paper and the egg still stuck. with the Silicone Brownie Pan the egg dish popped right out.
customer_reviews.author: Jan E Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Well 1/4 of my first brownies stuck to the bottom , but maybe if I waited till it cooled a little more I would of had better results. Also the brownie that stuck to the bottom was a little difficult to scrub between the ridges. I do like the silicone bottom making it easy to remove the brownie. I do like this product and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Morin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Not perfect but best I have found. Seems like they could put silicone over the metal rim and handles to not burn your hands and provide strength and metal stain resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan mainly to make egg bakes. I could not be happier with the pan! After a lot of dried stuck on egg with my glass baking pan (even with oiling it), I was so pleased that the egg bake literally just popped out of this silicone one. Super easy clean up and no left over egg residue. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Best pan ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace another silicone pan because those handled were also silicone and floppy. This pan is the best with the sturdy handles and rim which prevents the pan from flopping every which way when you’re taking something out of the oven. We use it to bake our chicken or pork chops.
customer_reviews.author: SYDSGRAM

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I make a lot of egg based dishes and have a hard time scraping it off my casserole dishes. I love the silicone baking dish as hardly anything sticks to it. I still spray oil on it like i would any dish I bake in and it works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Good non-stick pan
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to make bar cookies without having to use oil on the pan. It works very well, and the metal edge helps with putting it in and out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: reallyjilly

customer_reviews.title: Will Try One More Time
customer_reviews.text: Purchased especially to make brownies. The pan didn’t work like I thought it would but the brownies tasted fine. The company read the review and made good on the purchase with another selection. The company is practicing good customer service which deserves high marks.
customer_reviews.author: L3

customer_reviews.title: I've been very frustrated with my nonstick metal pans. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been very frustrated with my nonstick metal pans. I've been through two of them and both started sticking when I make brownies or biscuits. I've used this pan several times now, and even very sticky caramel brownies released effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Memphian

customer_reviews.title: Best brownie pan EVER
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is learning how to bake and brownies are a great starter item and this pan makes them bake up great and easy clean!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. Nothing sticks and it’s the perfect size for a casserole or brownies
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Good silicon pan
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected it to be. I like the metal frame, it helps to transfer the pan with batter. In the oven, it still requires a baking pan.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I baked eggs in this for egg breakfast sandwiches and it worked REALLY well!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Loved that i didn't need to grease the pan before ...
customer_reviews.text: The browning pan worked as described. Loved that i didn't need to grease the pan before baking. One think is that you must wait for the brownies to cool, or they may break apart when turning them over. Other than that, it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Acker

customer_reviews.title: Great tray wrong size
customer_reviews.text: The tray seemed to be great but had to return because the handles were too wide and couldn’t fit my toaster oven
customer_reviews.author: ToriU

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was hopefully optimistic about a silicone brownie pan living up to the hype and I wasn't disappointed. Perfect size, even cooking, takes up less space, is easy to clean up... what more could I want? I set it for the lowest recommended setting for an 8x8 pan and watched it and ended up with some pretty impressive brownies!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and people said it was too flimsy. I thought once brownies were baked it wouldn’t sag but it does.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brandley

customer_reviews.title: Pan worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Used this pan for fudge. As it was my first adventure with fudge, it was one less thing to worry about, because the pan worked perfectly. The fudge turned out just fine too!
customer_reviews.author: AML

customer_reviews.title: I was kinda disappointed I needed a nonstick spray
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda disappointed I needed a nonstick spray. I was hoping the silicone would eliminate the need. Other than that it worked great and I liked that the handles cooled so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: I use this for artwork
customer_reviews.text: I like this pan. I don’t use it for cooking. I use it for pour paintings. It’s perfect. It has a textured bottom and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use. Would get a second one if it was a little bigger. A rectangle maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Insight Retreat Center

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rather good value - sturdy and not floppy but my brownies never stick. Nice and deep too.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Browne

customer_reviews.title: still stick
customer_reviews.text: even though it is silicone the brownies still stick to the sides and bottom, the do not come out easy
customer_reviews.author: malia

customer_reviews.title: Silicone
customer_reviews.text: Treating it with care due to it is silicone. Is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Stability Is Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love the stability that the metal frame provides. Although I haven’t used it yet, it was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: B. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I wish i could find this in a 9x13 I really like this pan
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: BEST PAN EVAH!! Ends the brownie cutting dilemma
customer_reviews.text: Best pan evah!!! Cooks evenly - then cool- pop entire out then cut w plastic fork and they look da bomb!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Contains white fillers!
customer_reviews.text: This item does contain fillers. If you are familiar with the twist and pinch test, this item Fails. I returned this and purchased from freshware instead. They have a better product that does not contain fillers.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I was looking for. I have not used it yet so cannot rate its effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: R Happy

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: hard to clean. Flimsy so hard to store and cook with.
customer_reviews.author: SwampPudding

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the metal handles. They make it easier to pick up. I made brownies in it the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: R Ford

customer_reviews.title: Good pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan just something to get use to. But cleans well and brownies cook great.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Great baking dish!
customer_reviews.text: First try with a silicone baking pan. My wife was very happy with the first use of it. We love the metal handles which make it so much easier to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This lining pan fits very well in my cookie sheet and cleaned up beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: This lining pan fits very well in my cookie sheet and cleaned up beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Dabkowski

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t happy with it. Not nearly as stick-resistant as silicone muffin pans. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean and wonder and easy to remove from pan.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pan, but I don't like the rivets on the bottom of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Carey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Exactly what I was looking for. Great design and color
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the pan - used it yesterday! Thanks for the speedy service!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi L. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and clean and I love being able to handle it more easily
customer_reviews.author: SandyK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's wonderful for oil-free baking. The handles make it easy to lift out the oven. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bonproducer

customer_reviews.title: ... first two batches of brownies in this pan - LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have made my first two batches of brownies in this pan - LOVE, LOVE, LOVE the way the brownies did not stick!!!! Came out of the pan easily and a dream to clean :)
customer_reviews.author: Mrsdlc

customer_reviews.title: Silicon brownie pan
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I wanted to decrease the hard edges when making brownies. It did a good job. It is also nice because the whole pan of brownies lifts right out. Easier to frost and cut.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Fish

customer_reviews.title: Developed holes
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 6 months, but only used it 4 times. I went to use it again and saw that it had developed 2 small holes at the intersection of the bottom and sides. It looks like the silicone crumbled. This is too expensive to become defective after 4 uses!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Fullem

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: love love it--------easy - most important is the wrap around metal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality silicone pan and the perfect size for cooking may items. I try not to use aluminum foil for cooking so this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Love that the sides are stable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Love that the sides are stable, thanks to the rigid rim, unlike my previous pan.
customer_reviews.author: Alice C Hamilton Farley

customer_reviews.title: Silicon easy baking.
customer_reviews.text: The ease of use and cleaning. It also hold shape of baked item very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Sticky the second time!
customer_reviews.text: First batch of brownies came out cleanly. Second batch stuck. Trying to figure out the difference! The rigidity of the metal handles keeps the pan from flopping all over the place. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: P R

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is the very worse pan I have ever purchased..terrible
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sager

customer_reviews.title: No oil needed
customer_reviews.text: Cake easily came out of the pan with absolutely no oil!
customer_reviews.author: Staci Cattaneo

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't a fan it wasn't as easy as other silcone baking dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: This brownie pan is worth using.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best non stick browines pan I used for my whole life. I didn't even use a cooking spray. Plus it's bpa free which is worth a buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Barut

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan
customer_reviews.text: Just love this pan. I bake brownies in my microwave and it turns out so delicious!! Sorry I never knew about this pan earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonlady

customer_reviews.title: But I like the look of it
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift! Can't give you a proper review! But I like the look of it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came in good condition. Looks really useful
customer_reviews.text: Came in good condition. Looks really useful. It's a present so I don't know how well it actually works, which is why I only gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: dutchy

customer_reviews.title: The brownies taste like silicone--blecch! Super gross
customer_reviews.text: The brownies taste like silicone--blecch! Super gross. Wish I would have tried this pan out right away so I could return it. Giant fail.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions on the use of this pan and no instructions for the e-book cookbook. I believe I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Gammy

customer_reviews.title: I bought this pan to use in my NuWave Oven ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan to use in my NuWave Oven with the metal handles on it it doesn't fit so I guess I'll use it for other things but if you're buying it make sure it's going to fit your NuWave Oven
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea but rusted and absorbed odors - Great customer service however!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! It absorbs odors. It is difficult to clean because it is not a smooth shiny silicone pan. It rusts! The metal rusts after only a few washes! UPDATE: The customer service is excellent! They immediately refunded my full purchase price without my even asking! I am giving another star to reflect their terrific customer service. Thank you Boxiki!
customer_reviews.author: xxyyzzzzz

customer_reviews.title: Oven Temperature Guideline Missing
customer_reviews.text: I don't see a maximum oven temperature. I used it at 425 degrees. It is now permanently black on the bottom. Why?
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: not terribly durable - a big hole burned right through !
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I must not have read all the specs. The extended handles make it too big to use in my toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY A WELLS

customer_reviews.title: My Cornbread Popped Out Perfectly! :)
customer_reviews.text: This pan was perfect. I cooked an oil-free cornbread in it and it came out perfectly. No sticking! I am going to get the muffin pan by this manufacturer after this experience. I purchased a different muffin tin and it was a waste. My daughter cooked a regular (nonvegan) recipe of muffins in it and they did not pop out like this pan. I will probably buy more of these. I am looking forward to trying other recipes in it. Thank you Boxiki Kitchen! :)
customer_reviews.author: Janis Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and not flimsy at all.
customer_reviews.text: My glass square pan recently broke due to I started rinsing it with cold water when it was still super hot. Yeah, I'm an idiot. Anyway, I wanted a new pan that wouldn't take up much space, so this is perfect. I'm always reluctant to buy silicon baking/cooking items because sometimes they are so flimsy it makes getting them in and out of the oven nerve wrecking. This one is great though. It can be compressed down, but the silicone is thick and stiff. The frame around the silicone also helps a lot too. It's a really nice pan and is a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Grassshopper021

customer_reviews.title: Degraded after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: This pan is great for a while. It’s been a little over a year and it’s discolored and started to rust. For one year of use, not worth it. Get a metal pan. It can also be tricky to wash since things stick in the grooves and the pan is a bit floppy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy baking with no grease or flour.
customer_reviews.text: I no longer bake in any of my other metal pans!!! Glad I ordered silicone pans with the sturdy metal handles. I can’t imagine picking up a silicone pan without them. Everything I have made in this pan has baked so evenly. After cooling, the baked item comes out of the pan so easily—-with no grease or flour. I do have one recipe that calls for parchment paper and I was afraid not to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans easily. Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: This pan is great. I made an egg casserole in it and had virtually no residue left to lean. Was able to wipe clean by hand. Easy pan to grab even versus those that are completely silicone all around.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen McDevitt

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy to clean pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is really good for brownies and casseroles. I like that it has sturdy handles, makes it easier to take out of the oven. I put it in the dishwasher and the metal has a few rust spots but nothing too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Original Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I cook pork loin roasts in it, to perfection. It does seem to keep a bit of the smell from the spices but, I don't really care lol Very grateful for the handle. It is well attached. Good quality item!
customer_reviews.author: K. Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the regular baking pans
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for someone and they absolutely love it. Very flexible and easy to bake and remove baked item. Seems durable. This dish definitely represents non stick. I will absolutely be buying for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: True to description
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once. The cake came right out as described and it was easy to clean. The silicone takes some getting used to, not having a hard surface verses a flimsy inside surface.
customer_reviews.author: Tbrow

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with a silicone baking pan. It was great! Easy to use, easy to clean, this is just what I wanted in a brownie pan, what can I say more?
customer_reviews.author: M. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! The handles give the pan support
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! The handles give the pan support. (but they do get hot so don't forget your oven mitt). Fits is my large Breville toaster oven. I literally use it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl keenan

customer_reviews.title: great pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan because it's sturdier than other silicone pans, and still remains stick resistant. I wish they were more selections from this company.
customer_reviews.author: pssssst

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it has handles that make the silicon much sturdier; less risk of collapsing. Easy to clean. Overall glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jkl

customer_reviews.title: Much better than a metal pan
customer_reviews.text: Much better than a metal pan. Withstands oven temperatures. Easy to clean.( Not completely "Non-Stick" when cooking brownies but very easily and quickly cleaned with just water.)
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: no more metal pans for me....
customer_reviews.text: excellent service, it came quickly, i like the looks and modern structure of it, i'm going to order the round one too. my old pans were embarrassing, i'm thrilled to throw them away!
customer_reviews.author: Edie B. Mulesky

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Allows for a consistent baking. Now you can adjust temp or time in oven and not have to factor in the hot spots that happen in metal pans.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey St Aubin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pan
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a new pan to make cornbread in--my husband's favorite. The glass pan I had continually burned the crust, but this silicone pan is wonderful. It cooks the batter perfectly with no burned crusts.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Good baking pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan worked out great for my baking needs. The silicone is very pliable but the handles keep it together.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Darling

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: Made brownies with this pan. Nothing sticks. Didn't even have to grease the bottom. Great pan!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase. Easy removal of baked goods and clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. Easy removal of baked goods and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great To Bake In.
customer_reviews.text: I truly like and enjoy the Silicone baking pans. Period. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: I think this is what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Only used once, but I can see that it is going to be great in regards to food not sticking, which is why I bought it.

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. No support in the pan at all. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Omolope

customer_reviews.title: This pan is awesome! So easy to use and clean up
customer_reviews.text: This pan is awesome! So easy to use and clean up. I made brownies in it and was able to just turn the pan over after baking and pop them right out onto a plate. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicest brownie pan ever.
customer_reviews.text: Bakes perfectly and is easy to handle and easy to clean.. Couldn't ask for anything nicer for baking brownies.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. The cake popped right out without any effort.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cleans up easily and I love the way food cooks in it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! Love the steel handle, for support when carrying!

product_meta.title: Silicone Brownie Pan | Professional Non-Stick Square 8-inch Silicone Cake Pan for Baking by Boxiki Kitchen | Best No-Stick Oven Dish Bakeware | Silicone w/Steel Frame
feature_bullets: BEST SILICONE BROWNIES PAN – Ultimate non-stick convenience in a size perfect for thousands of tasty recipes; professional grade silicone bakeware in square cake pan shape
FLEXIBLE NON-STICK SILICONE – Food-grade silicone and textured surface combine for no mess cooking; dishwasher safe, no BPAs, non-toxic; safe for oven, freezer, refrigerator use
PROFESSIONAL DESIGN CAKES PAN – High quality steel frame means this square baking dish lasts longer than other products; will not sag, resists stains and odors for ultimate long life performance
FREE GIFT – “Top 65 Delightful Cake Pan Recipes” eBook is our thank you gift to you, includes dozens of favorite recipes that are tasty, healthy and simple to prepare; cook like a pro!

DIMENSIONS OF THE CAKE PAN – Square cake pan 8.5'' x 8.5'' x 1.75'' [internal size]; 13.25” long x 10” wide x 1.87” deep [external size], red silicone baking dish with high quality steel frame and handles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars278 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
